page.title: 03Darlington Housing: part 1
page.content:
{ } The{council houses}had smaller gardens than{private houses. }Most of the council houses were newer. Private houses were mostly different from each other but council houses were the same. In{Devonshire Road}the front gardens were very well kept and there were quite a few people working in their gardens. The houses at{Gurney {Pease}were old and had back yards only. {St James' School}is closed down but the church is not. St James' school also looks very old and is used as the church hall. {Darren Wheeldon
{Hopetown Lane}is a very long street in the middle of Darlington it is a bit run down and rural. It is definitely not the best part of town. The houses are terraced and not very
